trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration
trans-unit.target: 注销 PSSessionConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration
trans-unit.target: 注销 PSSessionConfiguration

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Deletes registered session configurations from the computer.
trans-unit.target: 从计算机中删除已注册的会话配置。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration** cmdlet deletes registered session configurations from the computer.
trans-unit.target: **Unregister-pssessionconfiguration** cmdlet 从计算机中删除已注册的会话配置。

trans-unit.source: This is an advanced cmdlet that is designed for system administrators to manage customized session configurations for users.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个高级的 cmdlet，主要面向系统管理员能够管理用户的自定义的会话配置。

trans-unit.source: To make the change effective, **Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration** restarts the **WinRM** service.
trans-unit.target: 若要使更改生效， **Unregister-pssessionconfiguration** 重启 **WinRM** 服务。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the restart, specify the *NoServiceRestart* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止重新启动，请指定 *NoServiceRestart* 参数。

trans-unit.source: If you accidentally delete the default Microsoft.PowerShell or Microsoft.PowerShell32 session configurations, use the Enable-PSRemoting cmdlet to restore them.
trans-unit.target: 如果您意外删除默认的 Microsoft.PowerShell 或 Microsoft.PowerShell32 会话配置，使用 Enable-psremoting cmdlet 将它们还原。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Session_Configurations.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Session_Configurations。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Delete a session configuration
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 删除会话配置

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the MaintenanceShell session configuration from the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将从计算机中删除 MaintenanceShell 会话配置。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Delete a session configuration and restart the WinRM service
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 删除会话配置并重新启动 WinRM 服务

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the MaintenanceShell session configuration from the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将从计算机中删除 MaintenanceShell 会话配置。

trans-unit.source: The command specifies the *Force* parameter to suppress all user messages, and to restart the **WinRM** service without prompting.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指定 *强制* 参数来取消显示所有用户消息，并重新启动 **WinRM** 服务，而不提示。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Delete all session configurations
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 删除的所有会话配置

trans-unit.source: These commands delete all of the session configurations on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令删除计算机上的所有会话配置。

trans-unit.source: The commands have the same effect and can be used interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令具有相同的效果，并且可以互换使用。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Unregister without a restart
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 注销而无需重新启动

trans-unit.source: This example shows the effect of using the *NoServiceRestart* parameter of **Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration**.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示使用的效果 *NoServiceRestart* 参数 **Unregister-pssessionconfiguration**。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is designed to prevent a service restart, which would disrupt any sessions on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此参数旨在防止服务重新启动，重新启动会干扰计算机上的任何会话。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses **Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration** to deletes the MaintenanceShell session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 **Unregister-pssessionconfiguration** 到删除 MaintenanceShell 会话配置。

trans-unit.source: However, because the command uses the *NoServiceRestart* parameter, the **WinRM** service is not restarted and the change is not yet completely effective.
trans-unit.target: 但是，由于该命令使用 *NoServiceRestart* 参数， **WinRM** 不重新启动服务，更改尚未完全有效。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses **Get-PSSessionConfiguration** to get the MaintenanceShell session.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Get-pssessionconfiguration** 来获取 MaintenanceShell 会话。

trans-unit.source: Because the session has been removed from the WS-Management resource table, **Get-PSSessionConfiguration** cannot return it.
trans-unit.target: 由于已从 Ws-management 资源表中删除了该会话 **Get-pssessionconfiguration** 不能将其返回。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses the New-PSSession cmdlet to create a session on the local computer that uses the MaintenanceShell configuration.
trans-unit.target: 第三个命令使用 New-PSSession cmdlet 在使用 MaintenanceShell 配置的本地计算机上创建会话。

trans-unit.source: The command succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 该命令执行成功。

trans-unit.source: The fourth command uses the **Restart-Service** cmdlet to restart the **WinRM** service.
trans-unit.target: 第四个命令使用 **重新启动服务** cmdlet 可重新启动 **WinRM** 服务。

trans-unit.source: The fifth command again uses the **New-PSSession** cmdlet to create a session that uses the MaintenanceShell configuration.
trans-unit.target: 第五个命令再次使用 **New-pssession** cmdlet 来创建使用 MaintenanceShell 配置的会话。

trans-unit.source: This time, the session fails because the MaintenanceShell configuration has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 此时会话失败，因为已删除 MaintenanceShell 配置。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the cmdlet does not prompt you for confirmation, and restarts the **WinRM** service without prompting.
trans-unit.target: 指示该 cmdlet 不会提示您进行确认，并重新启动 **WinRM** 服务，而不提示。

trans-unit.source: Restarting the service makes the configuration change effective.
trans-unit.target: 重新启动服务可使配置更改生效。

trans-unit.source: To prevent a restart and suppress the restart prompt, use the *NoServiceRestart* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止重新启动和取消重新启动提示，请使用 *NoServiceRestart* 参数。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of the session configurations to delete.
trans-unit.target: 指定要删除的会话配置的名称。

trans-unit.source: Enter one session configuration name or a configuration name pattern.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个会话配置名称或配置名称模式。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a session configurations to **Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道将会话配置传递到 **Unregister-pssessionconfiguration**。

trans-unit.source: -NoServiceRestart
trans-unit.target: -NoServiceRestart

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet does not restart the **WinRM** service, and suppresses the prompt to restart the service.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 不会重启 **WinRM** 服务，并且禁止提示重新启动该服务。

trans-unit.source: By default, when you run an **Unregister-PSSessionConfiguration** command, you are prompted to restart the **WinRM** service to make the change effective.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当您运行 **Unregister-pssessionconfiguration** 命令，系统将提示您重新启动 **WinRM** 服务以使更改生效。

trans-unit.source: Until the **WinRM** service is restarted, users can still use the unregistered session configuration, even though Get-PSSessionConfiguration does not find it.
trans-unit.target: 直到 **WinRM** 重新启动服务，用户仍然可以使用未注册的会话配置中，即使 Get-pssessionconfiguration 未找到它也是如此。

trans-unit.source: To restart the **WinRM** service without prompting, specify the *Force* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新启动 **WinRM** 服务而不进行提示，指定 *强制* 参数。

trans-unit.source: To restart the **WinRM** service manually, use the Restart-Service cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新启动 **WinRM** 手动服务，请使用 Restart-service cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.PSSessionConfigurationCommands#PSSessionConfiguration
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.PSSessionConfigurationCommands#PSSessionConfiguration

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a session configuration object from **Get-PSSessionConfiguration** to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道将会话配置对象从 **Get-pssessionconfiguration** 给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any objects.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不返回任何对象。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: To run this cmdlet on Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, and later versions of the Windows operating system, you must start Windows PowerShell by using the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista、 Windows Server 2008 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统上运行此 cmdlet，必须通过使用运行以管理员身份选项启动 Windows PowerShell。
